directions: Mix flour, baking powder and baking soda. Beat cream cheese, butter and sugar in large bowl with mixer until blended. Add bananas and eggs; mix well. Gradually add flour mixture, mixing well after each addition. Stir in nuts.
Pour into greased and floured 9x5-inch loaf pan.
Bake 1 hour 10 min. or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes; remove from pan to wire rack. Cool completely.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
title: Favorite Banana Bread
